name: bingo-game-simulator
description: A cooperative Bingo game simulator with intelligent move suggestions

scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:performance && npm run test:security
scripts.complexity: echo 'Running complexity analysis...' && node -e "console.log('Complexity analysis would run here')"
scripts.build: npm run lint:check && npm run test:all
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run optimize
scripts.optimize: echo 'Optimizing for production...' && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: if [ -f styles.css ]; then sed 's/\/\*.*\*\///g; s/  */ /g; s/^ *//g; s/ *$//g; /^$/d' styles.css > styles.min.css && mv styles.min.css styles.css; fi
scripts.deploy: npm run build:production && echo 'Ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:github: npm run deploy && echo 'Deploying to GitHub Pages...'
scripts.audit:full: npm run test:security && npm run lint:security && npm run quality
scripts.ci: npm run lint:check && npm run test:all && npm run audit
scripts.ci:fast: npm run lint:check && npm run test:unit && npm run test:security
scripts.performance: npm run lighthouse && npm run test:performance
scripts.validate: npm run format:check && npm run lint:check && npm run quality
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run test:unit
scripts.docs: echo 'Generating documentation...' && echo 'Documentation generation would run here'
scripts.analyze: npm run complexity && npm run quality:report && echo 'Analysis complete'

author: Your Name
